Articles.Content:
I think it would be a great case for a Moho colony to have a power generation purpose for the rest of the system and potentially in conjunction with solar sails, to beam us to the stars.
(Extreme case would have Moho deconstructed for a Dyson swarm, but that may be beyond KSP, for now)
I second the possibility of light sails, (similar to the future sneak peek heat panels) for a unique propulsion type and look.
Battery rockets would be effective if they have efficient engines.
